replies.body: "Nami. Malphite. Brand. Janna. Long ago, the four champions lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Brand attacked. Only the God fist, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new god fist, a blind monk named lee. And although his skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. But I believe lee sin can save the world."

Elemental {{champion:77}} actually uses elemental similar things. 
Tiger strikes like the wind. Bear strong as earth. Phoenix hot as fire. Turtle tough as water. Once all elements are mastered a god can be born.

Hey Oceania, feel free to check out our new Discord Server for the Oceanic League Of Legends sever:
https://discord.gg/eWdYAfb
